text: Nimen dang zhidao, fanshi nimen suo huode de zhanlipin, you wu fen zhi yi shi shuyu an la, shizhe [zhu][mu sheng],[mu sheng de] qinqi, gu'er, pinmin he luxing zhe de. Jiaru nimen xinyang an la he wo zai bianbie zhen wei zhi ri——liang jun zaoyu zhi ri [bai de'er zhanyi] jiang shi wo de puren [mu sheng] de qishi. An la dui wanshi shi wanneng de.
